properties.body:
HYDROARC 195/25(GEN).
ADDITIONAL MILITARY LAYERS (AML) ADVISORY.
1. USERS OF NGA AML PRODUCTS ARE ADVISED
   OF UNINTENDED ECDIS BEHAVIOR WHEN
   QUERYING AREA OBJECTS WITHIN EDITION 2 OF
   THE BOUNDARIES AML (U4R0UMBA THROUGH
   U4R0UMBZ) ONLY. EDITION 1 OF THE BOUNDARIES
   AML, OPAREA AMLS (U4R0UOA1, U4R0UOA3,
    U4R0UOA0) AND HITS AML (U4R0UHIT) ARE
   NOT AFFECTED. NGA HAS CONFIRMED THIS
   ISSUE AFFECTS NAVY VMS 9.5.2; OTHER SYSTEMS
   ARE CURRENTLY UNASSESSED. QUERYING AREA
   OBJECTS OF THE BOUNDARIES AML WILL CAUSE
   THE ECDIS TO LOCK UP AND SHUT DOWN AFTER
   USER ACKNOWLEDGEMENT.
   NGA RECOMMENDS REMOVING BOUNDARIES
   AML EDITION 2 LAYERS FROM THE CHART INDEX
   AND USING EDITION 1. KEEPING THE EDITION 2
   FILES WITHIN THE EMERGENCY NAVIGATION
   LAPTOP CREATES THE POTENTIAL FOR A USER
   TO QUERY A BOUNDARIES AML AREA OBJECT
   AND CRASH THE VMS UNIT WHILE UNDERWAY
   REQUIRING A SOFTWARE RESTART.
2. FOR QUESTIONS OR CONCERNS, CONTACT
   MARHELP@NGA.MIL.
